thread.section_title: Tablet2Cases Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Tablet2Cases | www.tablet2cases.com
thread.title: Lori Goodyear

author: Lori Goodyear
title: Lori Goodyear
text:
I am very pleased with the service and the products I received.I ordered wrong size first for my grand kids tablets,they refunded me for return cost plus the cost of the cases ,sent me out the right size.they always answered my emails with a very friendly ,professional attitude.I will definitely order from them again.
Thanks again
From Newfoundland,Canada
